original_title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic: Friendship University
overview: When Twilight hears of a Friendship University that has opened up in Las Pegasus she travels with Rarity to go and check it out. Much to her shock the school is run by Flim and Flam with Startswirl the Bearded attending! Twilight believes the school is a fake and uses her investigative skills to try and shut the school down.
title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic: Friendship University
